game_status_none: The Recalbox is on, but no game is currently running.
recalbox_not_found: The Recalbox could not be found.
recalbox_offline: The Recalbox seems to be offline.
screenshot_success: Screenshot taken and saved in the Recalbox screenshots folder!
screenshot_fail: The screenshot could not be taken.
no_game_on_system: Unfortunately, no games were found on the {console}.
game_not_found_on_console: The game {game} was not found on the {console}.
game_launched_error: The game {game} was found on the {console}, but the launch command failed.
game_launched_success: The game {game} was found. Launching on the {console}!
list_roms_failed: Cannot get roms list from Recalbox. Double check it is turned ON, and connected to network.
quit_kodi_failed: Cannot exit Kodi ! It is maybe not running...
Kodi doesn't seem to be running...
